input.sentences: the bumper car was fast and swift .
i took a picture with my family after the ride .
they caught a good picture of me smiling .
the theme park was really interesting .
my favorite part was the ride that was somewhat like a ski lift .
output.sentences: Kate really enjoyed the rides at the theme park.
But she and her family also took in the sights.
Many selfies were taken on that day.
This picture of the theme park is going on Instagram.
At the end of the day, they rode the SkyLine to get a better view of the park.
